coref: A Wild Boar was sharpening A Wild Boar tusks busily against the stump of a tree, when a Fox happened by. Now a Fox a Fox was always looking for a chance to make fun of a Fox neighbors. So a Fox made a great show of looking anxiously about, as if in fear of some hidden enemy. But A Wild Boar kept right on with a Fox work. Why are you doing that? asked a Fox a Fox at last with a grin. There isn't any danger that I can see. True enough, replied A Wild Boar, but when danger does come there will not be time for such work as this. My weapons will have to be ready for use then, or I shall suffer for My weapons.
